page.title: 06SOCIAL CONCERNS IN GOVAN
page.content: There have been expressions of concern in the area about{racial} {conflict.}It is said that coloured shop owners in particular are subject to burglaries and harassment. One asian shop assistant lost an eye in an apparently motiveless knife attack. The problem about using racism to explain this is that other shops are also burgled and robbed. Perhaps the high level of unemployment in the area is a clearer root cause of crime. the whole community suffers. One further concern is that different groups within the community, tend to arrive at different explanations for the problems they experience. There is evidence of anti-asian, anti- catholic, anti-protestant,not to mention anti-social behaviour. There is also a strong{community spirit;}the will to live in harmony must survive.
